attributes.additional_details:
I was appalled to discover some airlines can charge as much as £100 to simply alter the name of the person travelling, and some companies can even include an additional fee to charge you the 'current' price of the ticket, even though the ticket may have been purchased well in advance and the name alteration requested early.

It is reasonable to expect a small admin fee to alter the name on flight ticket, but this should be a standard fee which all flight companies should have to adhere to.
